name: Handmade Belgian Linen Cafe Apron
description:
Handmade vintage washed Belgian linen cafe apron with adjustable tie and double front pockets. Extra long ties. 7.5oz Linen Weight. 
100% Linen | Machine Wash and Hang Dry 

USA orders ship priority mail Wednesdays and Fridays

options.name: Default

name: Ivorie froufrou chic ribbon
description:
6 yards of either 0.5 inch, 1 inch or 1.5 inch Silk Ribbon. Made in 3 yard strips and packaged on natural wooden spools and stored in a muslin bag. A complete set is 3 yards of each width. 
The colours created for froufrou chic ribbons are often very complex blends of many colours, and as a result the surface of each ribbon can be a complex yet subtle interplay of nuances. The hand finishing of each yard of ribbon ensures the softest edge possible. 
USA orders ship priority mail Wednesdays and Fridays. 
Crafted in France by Heather.
